text: Binɨb mapen yad okok. Bɨ kɨli God takaw agobun agɨl, yepɨs agɨl ajɨpal okok, kɨli kuŋay mɨdebal. Anɨb ak tek binɨb ogɨnap God Kawnan ayɨp mɨdobun agenɨgel, nɨgtep gɨl takaw kɨlop ak dɨnɨmɨb. God Kawnan ayɨp mɨdobun apal ak pen, God Kawnan ne ak yɨpɨd gɨl akaŋ, kawnan yokɨp ak kɨlop gos ñek agebal akaŋ agɨl nɨgɨnɨmɨb.
